locations.name: Charing Cross Macs
locations.description: Home of slurpees, Pokémon cards, and all sorts of unhealthy snacks, this is place to go for the common, popular items.

locations.name: St. George Variety
locations.description: This is where you go to rent NES games and buy Betty candy. 107 for $1.07, what a steal!

locations.name: Terrace Hill Variety
locations.description: Closest to home, the Terrace Hill Variety doesn't have penny candies, but have a good selection of nickel candies and they tend to leave the top shelf of magazines exposed.
